item.description:
Hi,

I'm looking for people who work in Boston and would like to get together for a quick lunch during the week!

Check out this website for more info about the menu:

http://www.mccormicka...

Please be 99.9% sure you can make it if you reply yes because I will make a reservation with the restaurant.

UPDATE: I made a reservation, so I closed the yes option. Looking forward to seeing you all! The phone # for McCormick and Schmick's is 617-720-5522. The reservation is under my name (Lisa).

Cheers!

Lisa

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Mid-Week Lunch
